name: asciidoctor-chunker
description: Creates chunked (multi-page) HTML from Asciidoctor's single HTML file with supporting the fine-tuned splits in chapters, sections and any depth of subsections.
author: Wataru Shito (https://github.com/wshito)

scripts.sample: cd test/resources; make single; cd -; node src/index.mjs test/resources/output/single/sample.html --depth 2:4,3:2 -o test/resources/output/html_chunks
scripts.manual: cd example; make single; cd -; node src/index.mjs example/output-single/single/user-manual.html -o example/output-chunk/html_chunk
scripts.clean: make clean; cd test/resources; make clean; cd ../../example; make clean; cd -
